ygData.subject: Daph Dust
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok well thanks verant for takeing a logical skill and placeing absoulutly no logic into Gimbelstans book. Ok as for the quest for the daph dust i have
ygData.messageBody:
Ok well thanks verant for takeing a logical skill and placeing absoulutly
no logic into Gimbelstans book. Ok as for the quest for the daph dust i have
absoulutly no idea. Does anyone out there have the actual quest info?
I am hopeing the gm wasn't just getting a kick out of messing with the heads
of the tinker's out there but.... Well anyway I will belive it when i see it
I suppose.

Grundup PuddlejumperTinkerholic, 92 skill in the trade.

PS. How do I Respond to the current topic of the day? Dumb question i know.
